arts.sum: Newcastle United are still looking for their first win of the Premier League season, drawing 0-0 against Leeds United . Eddie Howe knew it was "never going to be easy", but goals and points are the biggest reward for the doubtless endeavour of his players, and he is pleased with the latest arrival.

arts.ttl: Newcastle winless start continues after Leeds draw
arts.sum: Newcastle United still remain winless in the Premier League after a 0-0 draw with Leeds United at Elland Road.

arts.ttl: Leeds Utd and Newcastle Utd locked level in eventless Elland Road draw
arts.sum: Leeds United and Newcastle United share the points as they play out a hard-fought 1-1 draw at Elland Road on gameweek three of the Premier League season.

arts.ttl: Leeds United 0-0 Newcastle United: New kid Woltemade watches wasteful Magpies draw with Leeds
arts.sum: Newcastle United will be desperate for Nick Woltemade to join his teammates on the pitch after a series of wastefulness led to the points being shared with Leeds United at Elland Road. Woltemade, who was spotted in the stands, watched his new teammates battle it out with Daniel Farkeâ€™s side - who came into this match unbeaten in 21 games at their home ground.
